articles.title: Pre-flight texts warned of weather and records show Kobe Bryant pilot became disoriented in fog - CNN
articles.description: Text messages prior to the doomed helicopter flight that killed NBA star Kobe Bryant and eight others show that weather conditions were a concern, and records show that the pilot appeared to become disoriented in fog.
